reference.shortdesc: The systemoutput element identifies computer output or responses to a command or situation.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The systemoutput element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the software domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and keyref.

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the systemoutput element identifies an application response to user input:
example.codeblock: After you type mealplan dinner, the meal planning program will print a For what day? message. Reply by typing the day of the week for which you want a meal plan, for example, Thursday.
